name: ollama-tag-cli
description: CLI tool for managing tags in Ollama ecosystem

scripts.backup: git add . && git commit -m "Backup: $(date -u '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - Development checkpoint"
scripts.backup:push: npm run backup && git push -u origin main
scripts.backup:full: npm run backup && git branch -M main && git push -u origin main
scripts.setup:repo: git init && git branch -M main && npm run backup
